languages.text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... И я схожу с ума, {name}. Раньше я думала, что мне под силу это контролировать, но теперь... Вы должны покончить с этим. Ради моего Дома. Ради вашей собственной безопасности. Ради меня..."

traits.locale_text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... И я схожу с ума, {name}. Раньше я думала, что мне под силу это контролировать, но теперь... Вы должны покончить с этим. Ради моего Дома. Ради вашей собственной безопасности. Ради меня..."

languages.text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."
languages.original_text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... И я схожу с ума, {name}. Раньше я думала, что мне под силу это контролировать, но теперь... Вы должны покончить с этим. Ради моего Дома. Ради вашей собственной безопасности. Ради меня..."

traits.locale_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

"When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

"When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going barmy, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

"When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going barmy, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

"When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

"When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

languages.text: 「カプセルが開くと、私の心は緋色、琥珀色、そして黒の薄汚れた色合いに溺れました…気がおかしくなってしまいそうです、{name}。以前は制御できると思っていましたが、今は…あなたが止めてください。オーセリオ家のため、あなた自身の安全のため、そして私のために…」
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

traits.locale_text: 「カプセルが開くと、私の心は緋色、琥珀色、そして黒の薄汚れた色合いに溺れました…気がおかしくなってしまいそうです、{name}。以前は制御できると思っていましたが、今は…あなたが止めてください。オーセリオ家のため、あなた自身の安全のため、そして私のために…」

languages.text: “当那个胶囊打开的时候，我的脑子里充满了红色和黑色的阴影，我……我要发疯了，{name}。我本以为我能驾驭这股力量，可现在……你必须结束这一切。为了我的家族，为了你自己的安全，也是为了我……”
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

traits.locale_text: “当那个胶囊打开的时候，我的脑子里充满了红色和黑色的阴影，我……我要发疯了，{name}。我本以为我能驾驭这股力量，可现在……你必须结束这一切。为了我的家族，为了你自己的安全，也是为了我……”

languages.text: «Cuando la cápsula se abrió, los tonos más sombríos del carmesí, del ámbar y del negro inundaron mi mente, y... Y me estoy volviendo loca, {name}. Pensé que podría controlar este poder, pero ahora... Debe ponerle fin a esto. Por el bien de mi casa. Por su propia seguridad. Por mí...».
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando la cápsula se abrió, los tonos más sombríos del carmesí, del ámbar y del negro inundaron mi mente, y... Y me estoy volviendo loca, {name}. Pensé que podría controlar este poder, pero ahora... Debe ponerle fin a esto. Por el bien de mi casa. Por su propia seguridad. Por mí...».

languages.text: "Als die Kapsel sich geöffnet hat, wurde mein Verstand mit schmutzigen Schattierungen von Rot und Umbra überflutet und Schwarz und ... Und ich werde verrückt, {name}. Ich dachte früher, ich könnte das kontrollieren, aber jetzt ... Ihr müsst dem ein Ende setzen. Für mein Haus. Für Euch und Eure Sicherheit. Für mich ..."
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

traits.locale_text: "Als die Kapsel sich geöffnet hat, wurde mein Verstand mit schmutzigen Schattierungen von Rot und Umbra überflutet und Schwarz und ... Und ich werde bekloppt, {name}. Ich dachte früher, ich könnte das kontrollieren, aber jetzt ... Ihr müsst dem ein Ende setzen. Für mein Haus. Für Euch und Eure Sicherheit. Für mich ..."

languages.text: « Quand la capsule s'est ouverte, mon esprit était noyé sous des teintes écarlates, ocre, noires et... je perds la tête, {name}. J'ai cru pouvoir contrôler ce pouvoir, mais... Il est temps d'en finir. Pour le bien de ma maison. Pour votre propre sécurité. Pour moi... »
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

traits.locale_text: « Quand la capsule s'est ouverte, mon esprit était noyé sous des teintes écarlates, ocre, noires et... je perds la tête, {name}. J'ai cru pouvoir contrôler ce pouvoir, mais... Il est temps d'en finir. Pour le bien de ma maison. Pour votre propre sécurité. Pour moi... »

languages.text: "Kapsül açılınca nahoş tonlarda kırmızılar, kahverengiler, siyahlar ve daha neler neler aklımı sardı... Gerçekten delirmek üzereyim {name}! Eskiden bunu kontrol edebileceğimi sanırdım ancak artık... Buna son vermelisin. Hanem için. Kendi güvenliğin için. Benim için..."
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I used to think I could control this, but now... You must end this. For the sake of my House. For your own safety. For me..."

traits.locale_text: "Kapsül açılınca nahoş tonlarda kırmızılar, kahverengiler, siyahlar ve daha neler neler aklımı sardı... Gerçekten delirmek üzereyim {name}! Eskiden bunu kontrol edebileceğimi sanırdım ancak artık... Buna son vermelisin. Hanem için. Kendi güvenliğin için. Benim için..."
